name: Mermaid VS. Human?
description:
WASD  or ARROWS keyboard control.

This is my entry to the Unity Create With Code Jam May 2022. Hope you like it even if there are some unresolved issues yet. My first Game Jam ever! Thanks everyone.

Minor error on full screen cropping top edge.

Credits to be added on next update:
